it.polimi.se2018.network.server

Class Lobby

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.network.server.Lobby
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class Lobby
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
    This class implements the Lobby, where all the clients are "stored" before becoming real players. Once the lobby reaches the right number of players, the game starts. In this class the patterns written in the file are loaded and parsed and sent to the users, so that they can choose one. It also handles the client/server communication with messages. It observes the Match.
